Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 0: Setup TypeScript build pipeline and Lit 3 foundation

- Add TypeScript 5.3 with lenient configuration \(allowJs: true\)
- Add Vite 5.0 for modern build tooling
- Add Lit 3.1.0 alongside existing Polymer 3.3.0 for incremental migration
- Create tsconfig.json \(lenient\) and tsconfig.strict.json \(target\)
- Create Polymer bridge type definitions for gradual migration
- Create animation system type definitions \(AnimatingComponent, FLIP types\)
- Add npm scripts: type-check, type-check:strict, dev, build
- Update .gitignore for TypeScript build artifacts \(dist/, *.tsbuildinfo\)
- Add MIGRATION_PLAN.md to track progress through 10 phases

Note: Firebase 5.11.1 excluded from installation due to gRPC compilation
issues on modern Node/ARM64. Listed in package.json for documentation.
Frontend migration proceeds without Firebase; runtime depends on backend.

Verification: npm run type-check passes with zero errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Add comprehensive TypeScript type definitions

- Add Redux store types \(RootState, AppState, GameState, UserState, ListState\)
  - Defines all state slices with proper interfaces
  - Documents lazy-loaded reducers \(game, list\)
  - Includes UserInfo, PlayerInfo, GameChest interfaces

- Add component interface types \(BoardgameComponentElement, stacks, animator\)
  - BoardgameAnimatableItemElement: Base FLIP animation interface
  - BoardgameComponentElement: Game component rendering interface
  - BoardgameCardElement, BoardgameTokenElement: Specific component types
  - BoardgameComponentStackElement: Stack layout interface
  - BoardgameComponentAnimatorElement: FLIP orchestration interface

- Add custom event types \(ProposeMoveEvent, ComponentTapEvent, etc.\)
  - Extends global HTMLElementEventMap for type-safe event listeners
  - Documents event detail structures for all custom events

These type definitions provide a foundation for type-safe component
migration while preserving runtime behavior. All definitions are
ambient \(.d.ts\) and don''t affect build output.

Verification: npm run type-check passes with zero errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Phase 2 \(Partial\): Migrate simple leaf components to Lit 3 + TypeScript

Migrated components:
- boardgame-404-view.ts: Static 404 error page
  - Converted from Polymer PolymerElement to Lit LitElement
  - Uses @customElement decorator for registration
  - css`` for styles, html`` for template
  - Adds HTMLElementTagNameMap declaration for type safety

- boardgame-player-chip.ts: Player avatar with color-hashed background
  - Converted property observers to updated\(\) lifecycle
  - Uses @property, @query decorators
  - Maintains color hashing algorithm \(displayName -> hsl color\)
  - Preserves agent/player avatar logic

Deferred components \(require paper-* dependencies\):
- boardgame-player-roster-item: Uses paper-styles, needs Phase 5
- boardgame-player-roster: Uses paper-dialog, paper-button, dom-repeat

Both migrated components maintain 100% behavior compatibility.
Old .js files remain for backward compatibility until full migration.

Verification: npm run type-check passes with zero errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
